director.name: 达尼埃莱·加利亚诺内 Daniele Gaglianone

this_title: Per fortuna non si è fatto male nessuno
introduction: Two years later, the victims of the racist raid carried out by Luca Traini in Macerata on 3 February 2018 retrace their past, reconstructing the hazards of fate that placed them on the trajectory of the bullets. How have their lives changed? How was it possible that the land and the community they had chosen to improve their lives was capable of generating such blind violence? During the reconstruction of the events of that February 3, 2018, the victims will prepare an interview with Luca Traini.
chinese_title: Per fortuna non si è fatto male nessuno
